name: Easy Upside-Down Pizza Casserole
author: Jenni
summary: I can't recall where I got this recipe from, but it is a very simple casserole that is very good too! Your little ones will love it for sure!
ingredients: ¼ cup sliced pitted ripe olives
1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Stir in sauce, mushrooms, and olives
Cook and stir until heated through, about 2 minutes more
Transfer mixture to a 2-quart rectangular baking dish
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the casserole
Flatten each biscuit with your hands and arrange on top of the cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until biscuits are golden, 15 to 17 minutes
